channel.title: Power BI on Gabriel Quinteros
channel.description: Recent content in Power BI on Gabriel Quinteros

item.title: Project I: SUBE personal data scraper and cleaner
item.description: A Python scraper that access the SUBE’s (Buenos Aires’s public transportation system) data of a particular person and then scrapes the information and adds it to an excel file. This file was then used to do some basic analysis and visualizations in PowerBi. How it works The scrape is done using python’s Selenium module which opens the browser, fill the credentials and then scrapes the data. It allows a much faster collection of the data than doing it by hand and it is intended to be ran at periodical intervals to track the person’s public transport use.
